title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Simulation/VR-Based Mathematics Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematical modeling process for real-world problem-solving in VR environments, divided into three or more stages.

Within four weeks, learners create one web-based interactive report using HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript and submit a result that passes 100% screen ratio compatibility testing on mobile devices (smartphones/tablets).
Learners provide feedback through peer evaluation that meets or exceeds 80% mathematical validity in project outputs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
